post:
Dear ladies and gentlemen,
I have some stock left on this dedicated server, so decided to post it here.

**Supermicro-Intel Atom C2750(8 Cores, 2.4 Ghz)**
<pre>
Supermicro Platform
RAM:16 GB DDR3
Disk:1x 2TB
Bandwidth: 100 Mbps
Price: $16/month with coupon code: YBDX4U70Q
</pre>

**HP-Intel Atom C2750(8 Cores, 2.4 Ghz)**
<pre>
HP Platform
RAM:8 GB DDR3
Disk:1x 2TB
Bandwidth: 100 Mbps
NO IPMI, you are limited to OS on order form
Manual OS reinstalls
Price: $14.50/month with coupon code: YBDX4U70Q
</pre>

The link: https://drserver.net/dedicated.php

If you feel a dedicated server is not yet for you, our affordable VPS is always available

**KVM-S**
<pre>
4 CPU Cores
4096 MB RAM
90 GB SSD Disk
4096 GB Bandwidth
1 IPv4
/64 IPv6
KVM
Linux/Windows
Location Dallas
Price: $7/month with coupon code: LET-It-GO
</pre>

The order link: https://drserver.net/vps.php

**Useful Info:**
<pre>
All VPS offers are powered by Virtualizor control panel. 
All VPS offers come with 1 IPv4 unless otherwise stated. 
IPv6 right now is available in Dallas.
IPv4 rDNS is only available for Dallas.
We don't recommend running mail servers on our VPS-es except for your personal emails.
We provide best-effort application support a.k.a hand-holding for either VPS or dedicated servers. 
The servers in this offer are not managed, however we can provide you with application support and install the applications, you require for FREE.
The VPS are hosted on powerful E5 nodes with minimum of 128 GB RAM and SSDs in RAID-10.
</pre>

**About us:**
<pre>
drServer started offering service around November of 2013, so we're almost 5 years old. The doctor is still here and still stronger than ever. The doctor can satisfy all your hosting needs. 
</pre>

**Useful Links Section:**
<pre>
Terms of Service: https://drserver.net/termsofservice.php
AUP: https://drserver.net/aup.php
Ticket us: https://portal.drserver.net/?/tickets/new/ 
Forum: https://forum.drserver.net
Blog: https://blog.drserver.net 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/drserver.net/ 
Twiter: https://twitter.com/drservervps 
</pre>

**FAQ:**
<pre>
Q: Do you allow gameservers?
Because most gameservers generally attract (D)DoS attacks, we currently do not allow them on our network. 
This also applies to voiceservers such as Teamspeak and Mumble.
Q: Can I run a VPN?
Private VPN servers are perfectly fine with us. Public ones, however, are not.
Q: What's your refund policy?
We do have a 30-day refund policy for your first service with us.
Q: What payment methods are accepted?
We accept payments via PayPal and BitPay.
Q: Do you have a test IP/file?
Yes.
Q: Do you offer instant setup?
Servers on this offer are instantly provisoned, subject to stock availability.
</pre>

**Network Info:**

Thanks for reading the thread!

Have a good day!
